MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the PA1 postcode area of Paisley. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 2:30pm due to third party damage on our underground cable network outside 46 Oakshaw Street West and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 5:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2:13pm on Monday, 12 October 2020
